caption:
“Laborare est orare — To work is to pray.”

Reflection:
The humble rhythm of labor sanctifies the day. Each task, done with love, becomes incense rising heavenward.

Commentary:
This Benedictine principle means holiness is found in ordinary effort. When work is offered to God, even simplicity becomes sacred.
